ValidationRule.description: When User Select RTGS of Mode PickList and Forex of Mode Selection then not entering data in Cheque/DD Date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Mode__c , 'RTGS') , ISPICKVAL( Mode_Selection__c,'Forex') , ISBLANK( Cheque_DD_Date__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Selecting RTGS of Mode PickList and forex of Mode Selection Pick List, Cheque/DD Date cann't be blank.
